content: perfect for donation the refuge hat uses half_double_crochet throughout to create a thick and comfy texture that will keep your head warm in any conditions make it in wool or acrylic cotton or blends and donate it to every place that accepts hats yarn approx 140 yds worsted weight yarn i have used vanna s choice hobby lobby i love this yarn lion brand fishermen s wool pictured cascade 220 caron simply soft and more hook size us i / 5 5mm hook notions darning needle gauge 3 half_double_crochet x 3 half_double_crochet= 1 sizes 18 unstretched - fits most teens/adults abbreviations bpdc = back post double_crochet chain = chain fpdc = front post double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet round = round sl = slip st s = stitch es
